text: Guys, you must've seen and heard many stories of love

and nor it's there any hope of their coming together soon
not only this, both of them have never met each other

and his love is an common girl
their love started through an app and now the girl is desperate for marriage
is an single mother and the mother of 4 children
actually, Laura started talking to the jailed Terrell through an app in October 2021
and soon her love started rising
at the time of the incident, Terrell's age was only 18-years-old
Laura says that it has been more than a decade since that incident
then Terrell was a teenager but now he's a different person
